abstract: Letter from New York City Police Commissioner James P O'Neill comments on Patrick J Lynch October 27 Op-Ed article regarding tactics and strategies used by NYPD.
lead_paragraph: The commissioner says the Police Department is transforming the patrol model to one that connects better with communities and is better at fighting crime.
snippet: The commissioner says the Police Department is transforming the patrol model to one that connects better with communities and is better at fighting crime....

headline.main: Community Policing, as the N.Y.P.D. Chief Sees It
headline.print_headline: Community Policing, as the Commissioner Sees It
